question:
Match the columns:
List I List II
Forms Quantities
A. Cusec 1. Pressure
B. Byte 2. Intensity of earthquakes
C. Richter 3. Rate of flow
D. Bar 4. Computer memory
     A B C D
explanation:
• Cusec is a measure of flow rate and is informal shorthand for \"cubic feet per second\".
• The byte is a unit of digital information of computer memory that most commonly consists of eight bits.
• The so-called Richter scale is used for measuring the strength of earthquakes refers to the original \"magnitude scale\" developed by Charles F. Richter.
• The bar is a metric unit of pressure, but is not approved as part of the International System of Units (SI).
